javax.microedition.media
类 VideoCapturePlayer

java.lang.Object
  javax.microedition.media.VideoCapturePlayer
所有已实现的接口：
Controllable, Player
public class VideoCapturePlayer
extends java.lang.Object
implements Player

Simulation player to be able to simulate recording video on microemu.

作者：
Rainer Burgstaller

字段摘要
 
从接口 javax.microedition.media.Player 继承的字段
CLOSED, PREFETCHED, REALIZED, STARTED, TIME_UNKNOWN, UNREALIZED
